column1: Uncontrolled data used in OS command
column2: Using user-supplied data in an OS command, without neutralizing special elements, can make code vulnerable to command injection.
column4: This argument to an OS command is derived from [["user input (string read by fgets)"|"relative:///main.c:28:14:28:17"]], dangerously concatenated into [["sprintf output argument"|"relative:///main.c:38:13:38:19"]], and then passed to system(__command).
